resources:
Security & Privacy iGap attaches the utmost importance to your security and privacy using the individual encryption algorithms and guarantees a safe and secure connection between you, your friends and family.
Chat You can have one-on-one or group chats and even create your own channel and add members in order to share information with millions of people.
iLand iLand! without limitation\nwith wonderful events as taking a taxi, pay bills and booking hotels and flights . Oh Also you can play games, watch films and listen to music
Start Now
Nearby Feature Leave a new world around me. Around you, find your friends, entertainment centers, art, business and other and enjoy your moments ...

No Status about %d m Your Status Clear Status You will be visible to others with no status. Are you sure to continue?
Enable Nearby Disable Nearby Enabling Nearby will result in getting your and others\' status visible to both. Are you sure to continue? Disabling Nearby will not only result in hiding your status from others, but you won\'t also be able to see others\' status within your certain range. Are you still sure to continue? Notice! Activating "Map Status" will result in making your location visible to others. Please be sure about it before turning on. Only the users within your 5KM radius distance are visible to you if their Map Status in ON.
Your status cannot exceed 4 lines.
24 hour clock Dark Theme PassCode Lock Unlock With FingerPrint Change PassCode Auto-lock Allow Screen Capture Confirm fingerPrint to continue Touch sensor FingerPrint Fingerprint not recognized. Try again The app will be locked after each time you choose and you need to unlock it at the beginning. If enabled, you can take screenshots of the app, but the system will display your chats in the task switcher even when the passcode is on. You may need to restart the app for this to take effect. When you set a passcode, a lock icon will appear on top of the main chats page. Tap it to lock or unlock the app. \nNote: you can set only numbers as a PIN or a combination of numbers and letters as a Password with no restriction. \nIf you forget your passcode, you just need to log out once and log in again with no need to enter the PIN/Password.
If you have forgotten your PIN/Password, there is no way to recover but only to log out and log in again. Are you sure to log out? Forgot PIN/Password? Enter your passcode Enter your new passcode Re-enter your passcode

Please make sure you write down and save your recovery phrase. You will need this phrase to restore your wallet. Okay, I have written it down. Recovery keys\' language: Recovery keys\' length: water Blue brown ... Ok Account Info Here is all of the information related to your account in Kuknos platform. 1. Recovery keys 3. Public Key This key is for you to share with others in order to get currencies from them. 2. Private Key This key is private and with this key, you can access to your account and restore your wallet. Please be notified that this key MUST not be shared with others. Create a 4 digit local PIN This 4 numeric PIN will be used for future login and confirmations. Please make sure you choose a PIN that is difficult to guess for others. Submit Please enter your PIN code. Confirm your PIN code Please re-enter your selected PIN code. Confirm Your PIN code does NOT match. Transfer is successfully done. Something went wrong. Please try again. Wallet Address must not be empty. Memo is too long. Amount must not be empty. NOT enough credit. Amount format is wrong. please only use . and digits. Transfer Status via Public Key via Kuknos ID Date Description Amount Error The connection to server is lost. Please try again in a few moments. Setting Logout Success Fail Show Recovery Keys Please enter your PIN to view your recovery phrase. PIN View Loading... Current PIN must NOT be empty. Current PIN is a 4-digit number. PIN code is wrong. Please try again. Fail Logout Warning: loging out from your wallet will wipe the information from this machine. To view your wallet, you will have to go through the restoration process again. PIN Logout Loging out... Buy %1$s Kuknus is a multi-token platform that provides issues of any assets. In Kuknos platform we have an assets called %1$s. Number of %1$s* : Buy Checking... Finilizing... Fetching data... PS:\n - Rest of the assets in kuknus is valuated by this Paymon\n - Since Paymon has been backed by gold (one unit of PMN is equal to 30 mg 24-karat gold)\n - will be used as transactions fee\n - Consider as a gauge for assessing minimum balances\n Sum: IRR Number of %1$s can NOT be empty. Number of %1$s can NOT be zero. The connection to server is lost. Please try again in a few moments. You are exceeding the maximum buyable value of this token. Your order is less than the minimum buyable value of this token. Selling* Buying* If you have 10,000 contracts or more in your account, submit a redemption request from this section and for every 10,000 contracts, continue with a gold backing pack that is not a 24 carat gram bar. The fee for each package is 1.50 contracts, which will be charged to you at the time of user account registration. Number of packages Submit Sending Selling Amount can NOT be empty.
